Class SinglePlayerGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.jpacman.game.Game
      • nl.tudelft.jpacman.game.SinglePlayerGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Level.LevelObserver

    public class SinglePlayerGame
extends Game
    A game with one player and a single level.

        public void reset()
        Resets the score (to 0) and the number of player lives (to 3). (should be called when a new level is set "manually" i.e. using "level choice" radio buttons)
